pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 29, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will greet the President of Mexico, Enrique Peña Nieto, and the President of the United States of America, Barack Obama, at the North American Leaders’ Summit.

National Gallery of Canada
380 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled media coverage


11:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Plenary Session of the North American Leaders’ Summit.

Room A-107
National Gallery of Canada
380 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled media coverage


1:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Family Photo with President Peña Nieto and President Obama.

National Gallery of Canada
380 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a luncheon with President Peña Nieto and President Obama.

National Gallery of Canada
380 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Closed to media.

3:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint press conference with President Peña Nieto and President Obama.

Great Hall
National Gallery of Canada|
380 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario  

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


4:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will greet President Obama on Parliament Hill.

Peace Tower Entrance, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Welcoming Ceremony for President Obama.

Confederation Hall (Rotunda), Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open media coverage


4:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with President Obama.

Cabinet Room, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address to Parliament. President Obama’s address to Parliament will follow.

House of Commons Chamber, Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage for cameras and photographers


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
